flavor_text_entries.red:
Appears in filthy
areas. Thrives by
sucking up polluted sludge
that is pumped
out of factories.
flavor_text_entries.blue:
Appears in filthy
areas. Thrives by
sucking up polluted sludge
that is pumped
out of factories.
flavor_text_entries.yellow:
Made of hardened
sludge. It smells
too putrid to touch.
Even weeds won't
grow in its path.
flavor_text_entries.gold:
As it moves, it
loses bits of its
body from which new GRIMER emerge.
This worsens the
stench around it.
flavor_text_entries.silver:
Wherever GRIMER
has passed, so
many germs are left behind that
no plants will
ever grow again.
flavor_text_entries.crystal:
When two of these
POKéMON's bodies
are combined together, new
poisons are
created.
flavor_text_entries.ruby:
GRIMER’s sludgy and rubbery body can
be forced through any opening, however
small it may be. This POKéMON enters sewer pipes to
drink filthy wastewater.
flavor_text_entries.sapphire:
GRIMER emerged from the sludge that
settled on a polluted seabed.
This POKéMON loves anything filthy. It constantly leaks a horribly germ-
infested fluid from all over its body.
flavor_text_entries.emerald:
Born from polluted sludge in the sea,
GRIMER’s favorite food is anything filthy.
They feed on wastewater pumped out from
factories.
flavor_text_entries.firered:
Sludge exposed to X rays from the moon
transformed into GRIMER. It loves feeding
on filthy things.
flavor_text_entries.leafgreen:
Appears in filthy areas. It thrives by
sucking up polluted sludge that is pumped
out of factories.
flavor_text_entries.diamond:
It was born when sludge in a dirty
stream was exposed to the moon’s
X-rays. It appears among filth.
flavor_text_entries.pearl:
It was born when sludge in a dirty
stream was exposed to the moon’s
X-rays. It appears among filth.
flavor_text_entries.platinum:
It was born when sludge in a dirty
stream was exposed to the moon’s
X-rays. It appears among filth.
flavor_text_entries.heartgold:
As it moves, it loses bits of its body,
from which new GRIMER emerge.
This worsens the stench around it.
flavor_text_entries.soulsilver:
Wherever GRIMER has passed, so
many germs are left behind that
no plants will ever grow again.
flavor_text_entries.black:
It was born when sludge in a dirty
stream was exposed to the moon’s
X-rays. It appears among filth.
flavor_text_entries.white:
It was born when sludge in a dirty
stream was exposed to the moon’s
X-rays. It appears among filth.
flavor_text_entries.black-2:
Born from sludge, these Pokémon now
gather in polluted places and increase
the bacteria in their bodies.
flavor_text_entries.white-2:
Born from sludge, these Pokémon now
gather in polluted places and increase
the bacteria in their bodies.
flavor_text_entries.x:
Sludge exposed to X-rays from the moon
transformed into Grimer. It loves feeding
on filthy things.
flavor_text_entries.y:
Appears in filthy areas. It thrives by sucking up
polluted sludge that is pumped out of factories.
flavor_text_entries.omega-ruby:
Grimer’s sludgy and rubbery body can be forced through any
opening, however small it may be. This Pokémon enters sewer
pipes to drink filthy wastewater.
flavor_text_entries.alpha-sapphire:
Grimer emerged from the sludge that settled on a polluted
seabed. This Pokémon loves anything filthy. It constantly
leaks a horribly germ-infested fluid from all over its body.
flavor_text_entries.sun:
Its main source of food is the slimy industrial
waste of factories. This Pokémon’s numbers
have been decreasing in recent years.
flavor_text_entries.moon:
It was born from sludge transformed by
exposure to X-rays from the moon. When its
internal load of germs decreases, it dies.
flavor_text_entries.ultra-sun:
It was born from sludge on the ocean floor. In a
sterile environment, the germs within its body
can’t multiply, and it dies.
flavor_text_entries.ultra-moon:
The wastewater coming from factories is clean
these days, so Grimer have nothing to eat.
They’re said to be on the verge of extinction.
flavor_text_entries.lets-go-pikachu:
Made of congealed sludge. It smells too putrid
to touch. Even weeds won’t grow in its path.
flavor_text_entries.lets-go-eevee:
Made of congealed sludge. It smells too putrid
to touch. Even weeds won’t grow in its path.
